General.Name: Goldenstone Acquisition Ltd
General.Description: Goldenstone Acquisition Limited does not have significant operations. It focuses on entering into a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, recapitalization, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Flushing, New York.
General.Address: 37-02 Prince Street, Flushing, NY, United States, 11354
